New Records: Buddy Hield made 12 out of 16 3-pointers in his first two games, the most in NBA history for a player with a new team
Key Match Events: Hield came off the bench midway through the first quarter with the Warriors trailing by nine and immediately hit a 3-pointer off a pass from Curry and followed it with a layup, turning the game around
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Warriors had a blowout win over the Blazers in their opener; the Jazz opened with a 15-6 lead but struggled to keep up
